Class LoginPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • LoginPresenter

  • public class LoginPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Presenter which gives users information related to login and account management

      • notLoggedInOptions

        public java.lang.String notLoggedInOptions()
        Gives a confirmation of the login process.
        Returns:
        Confirmation that the person is in the process of logging in, and options to abort.

      • inquireAccount

        public java.lang.String inquireAccount()
        Gives the options to a person to either log in or create a new account.
        Returns:
        The different options and associated commands to either log in or create a new account.

      • confirmMakeAccount

        public java.lang.String confirmMakeAccount()
        Gives a confirmation of the account creation process.
        Returns:
        Confirmation that the person is in the process of account creation, and options to abort.

      • confirmChangePassword

        public java.lang.String confirmChangePassword()
        Gives a confirmation of the password changing process.
        Returns:
        Confirmation that the person is in the process of resetting their password, and options to abort.

      • confirmLogout

        public java.lang.String confirmLogout()
        Gives a confirmation of the logout process.
        Returns:
        Confirmation that the person is in the process of logging out, and options to abort.

      • promptName

        public java.lang.String promptName()
        Prompts the person to enter their name.
        Returns:
        A prompt for a person to enter the name associated with their account.

        public java.lang.String promptNewPassword()
        Prompts the person to enter a new password.
        Returns:

      • promptAccountLogin

        public java.lang.String promptAccountLogin()
        Prompts a person to login.
        Returns:
        A greeting and a prompt for the person to login to an existing account.

      • passwordUpdated

        public java.lang.String passwordUpdated()
        Confirmation of password update.
        Returns:

        public java.lang.String loggedOff()
        Confirmation of logout.
        Returns:

      • failedLogin

        public java.lang.String failedLogin()
        Indication that login has failed.
        Returns:
